00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_DETAIL_FUNCTOR_IDENTITY_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_DETAIL_FUNCTOR_IDENTITY_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/mpl/equal_to.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/mpl/at.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/mpl/int.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/mpl/size.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/mpl/eval_if.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/type_traits/add_reference.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/functor/crtp_unary_and_up.hpp>
00019 
00020 namespace boost{
00021 namespace assign{
00022 namespace v2{
00023 namespace functor_aux{
00024 
00025     struct result_of_identity{
00026 
00027         template<typename V>
00028                 struct is_ok : boost::mpl::equal_to<
00029                 boost::mpl::int_<1>,
00030                 boost::mpl::size<V>
00031         >{};
00032 
00033         template<typename V>
00034         struct enable
00035         {
00036                 typedef typename boost::mpl::at_c<V,0>::type t_;
00037             typedef typename boost::add_reference<t_>::type type;
00038         };
00039 
00040         template<typename V>
00041         struct disable{};
00042 
00043         template<typename V>
00044         struct apply : boost::mpl::eval_if<
00045             is_ok<V>,
00046             enable<V>,
00047             disable<V>
00048         >{};
00049 
00050     };
00051 
00052         struct identity : functor_aux::crtp_unary_and_up<
00053         functor_aux::identity,
00054         functor_aux::result_of_identity
00055     >
00056     {
00057         identity(){}
00058 
00059         template<typename T> T& impl(T& t)const{ return t; }
00060         template<typename T> T const& impl(T const& t)const{ return t; }
00061 
00062     };
00063 
00064 }// functor_aux
00065 namespace{
00066         functor_aux::identity const _identity = functor_aux::identity();
00067 }
00068 }// v2
00069 }// assign
00070 }// boost
00071 
00072 #endif
